scripts.build: bun build ./src/runtime/create-kernel-runtime.ts --outfile ./dist/runtime/create-kernel-runtime.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/portset && bun build ./src/entrypoint/run-entrypoint.ts --outfile ./dist/entrypoint/run-entrypoint.js --external zod --external @gooi/artifact-model/validation --external @gooi/capability-contracts/capability-port --external @gooi/host-contracts/clock --external @gooi/host-contracts/delegation --external @gooi/host-contracts/identity --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/host-contracts/replay --external @gooi/host-contracts/portset --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/stable-json --external @gooi/surface-contracts --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/semantic-engine --external @gooi/guard-runtime/evaluate && bun build ./src/projection/shape-query-output.ts --outfile ./dist/projection/shape-query-output.js --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/projection-semantic --external @gooi/projection-contracts/envelopes/projection-result-envelope --external @gooi/projection-contracts/plans/projection-plan
